# Group Members
This was implimented by Ankit Dutta (x20185502), Prashanti Lagidi (x20188617), Rijo John (x20211163), Saiteja Reddy Pydimarla (x20223722).

# S3 CRUD API using API Gateway and AWS Lambda for SCP CA1 Submission
REST API Link (https://enpesj6244.execute-api.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/dev/file)

# Instructions to use this API
Use any API Tester and run the following commands
POST (https://enpesj6244.execute-api.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/dev/file) with body

{
    "fileKey": "images/pic9.png",
    "file": "data:image/png;base64,"
}
